segments.text: Hmm . Not bad . I think I look younger with shorter hair .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , you do . The Hot Cap is back here in the corner . I think we're ready to put the curlers in . What kind of perm would you like ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I just want a light wave . I look really silly if my hair is too curly .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: All right . What if we leave your bangs straight and just perm the sides and back ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Super . How long will I have to sit under the Hot Cap ?
segments.speaker: S1
